conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: What kind of clothes would a mysterious traveler wear?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: A mysterious traveler would typically wear dark, earthy colors like black and dark brown. They would also wear clothing made from sturdy materials like leather or thick cotton to withstand long journeys.

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Accessories like a cloak or a hood would be perfect for a mysterious traveler. They could also wear a bandana or a scarf to conceal their face if they wished. And don't forget the boots, sturdy and comfortable boots are a must for any traveler

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: That sounds perfect, I'll take it

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Great! I have just the outfit for you. Trust me, you'll look like a true mysterious traveler.
